This is a testharness.js-based test.
FAIL Dedicated worker with local scheme inherits referrer policy from the creating document. assert_equals: expected (undefined) undefined but got (string) "http://web-platform.test:8001/"
FAIL Shared worker with local scheme inherits referrer policy from the creating document. assert_equals: expected (undefined) undefined but got (string) "http://web-platform.test:8001/"
Harness: the test ran to completion.
